info.description: The Talent Management public service contains resources that expose Workday Talent Management Business Services data. This service can be used for integration with other talent management  systems.
info.title: Talent Management

get.description:
Returns mentorships viewable by authenticated user.

Secured by: Worker Data: Mentoring, Self Service: Mentoring

parameters.name: mentee
parameters.description: Filter the mentorship by using the WID of Mentee.

parameters.name: closed
parameters.description: Get only the closed mentorship if set to true.

parameters.name: mentor
parameters.description: Filter the mentorship by using the WID of Mentor.

parameters.name: closeMentorshipReason
parameters.description: Filter the mentorship using the WID of close mentorship reason.

parameters.name: mentorType
parameters.description: Filter the mentorship by using the WID of Mentor Type.

parameters.name: inProgress
parameters.description: Get only the in progress mentorship if set to true.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of instances to retrieve

post.description:
Functional Description
---
The Close Mentorship endpoint will be used to Close mentorships.

Example Use Cases
---
ESS: Worker or Mentor wants to close the mentorship.

Additional Information
---
* Security for ESS and MSS follows the security policy of the Manage Mentorship business process policy.
** Close ~Mentorship~ with
* If the business policy for Manage ~Mentorship~ has an approval step, then the mentorship will not be closed until the mentorship event is approved.

Secured by: Close ~Mentorship~ with

Functional Description
---
The Edit Mentorship endpoint will be used to Edit the mentorships.

Example Use Cases
---
ESS: Worker or Mentor wants to edit the mentorship to update additional informations.

Additional Information
---
* Security for ESS and MSS follows the security policy of the Manage Mentorship business process policy.
Edit ~Mentorship~ with
* If the business policy for Manage ~Mentorship~ has an approval step, then the mentorship will not be updated until the mentorship event is approved.

Secured by: Edit ~Mentorship~ with

post.summary: Creates a mentorship between two workers.
post.description:
Functional Description
---
The Create Mentorship For Worker endpoint is used to create new mentorships between two workers.

Example Use Cases
---
A manager can create a mentorship for thier direct report, and have the ability to choose a mentor, mentor type, and provide a purpose.
An Admin can create a mentorship between a worker and a mentor.

Additional Information
---
The security follows the security policy of the Manage Mentorship business process.
The mentee, mentor, mentor type, purpose, and comment are specified in the body of the request.
If the business definition for Manage ~Mentorship~ has an approval step, then the mentorship is not created until the mentorship event is approved in Workday.

Secured by: Add a ~Mentor~ for ~Worker~

post.summary: Creates a mentorship for the current processing worker where the user is also the mentee.
post.description:
Functional Description
---
The Create Mentorship For Me endpoint is used by a user to create new mentorships for themself.

Example Use Cases
---
ESS: An employee wants to create a mentorship for themself and choose a mentor, mentor type, and provide a purpose.

Additional Information
---
* The security for the employee follows the security policy of the Manage Mentorship business process.
* The mentee will default to current processing worker, and the mentor is specified in the body of the request.
* If the business definition for Manage Mentorship has an approval step, then the mentorship is not created until the mentorship event is approved in Workday.

Secured by: Add a ~Mentor~

comment.description: Returns last comment entered on the event, not including composed events, without security filtering. This CRF is for Integration use only.

items.description: This object represents the possible facets for this resource

facetParameter.description: The alias used to select the facet

count.description: The number of instances returned by this facet

management_level.description: The job profile's management type name

job_profile_id.description: The job code for the job profile.  This is the unique identifier for the job profile.

management_level_rank.description: The job profile's management level number

job_profile_name.description: The name of the job profile.

job_family_group.description: The job profile's family group name

city.description: The city from the primary address for the Location.

country.description: The country from the primary address for the Location.

state.description: The state from the primary address for the Location.

compa_ratio.description: Proposed Compa-Ratio as of this ~Worker~ Event

performance_rating_manager.description: The manager's numeric rating value of the manager evaluation. Only returns values for ~Employee~ ~Review~, will return 0 for others. Bypasses normal business process security.

manager_id.description: The manager ~worker~ id for this Event

currency.description: The currency ID in which the current amount are displayed as of the completion of this ~Worker~ Event.

effective.description: The date this business process takes effect.

is_promotion.description: Returns true if the event is a promotion and a false if the event is not a promotion.

bonus.description: The one-time payment amount for the event, in currency's precision accuracy.

base_pay.description: The proposed base pay for the ~employee~ from the ~Employee~ Compensation Event or ~Employee~ Compensation Event subprocess(es). This is the sum of an ~employee's~ compensation element amounts that are considered base pay. The number is represented in the currency and frequency of the ~employee's~ compensation grade profile, or compensation grade if no compensation grade profile exists. Limited to currency's precision.

completed.description: The date and time the business process was completed.

is_demotion.description: Returns true if the event is a demotion

compensation_grade_rank.description: The compensation grade rank newly assigned or changed for the ~worker~.

compensation_grade.description: The compensation grade name newly assigned or changed for the ~worker~.

base_pay_annualization_factor.description: The Frequency for the Contract Pay Rate on the position as of this business process' completion.

job_title.description: The new job title for the ~worker~ as of the effective date.

performance_rating_employee.description: The ~employee's~ numeric rating value of the self evaluation. Only returns values for ~Employee~ ~Review~, will return 0 for others. Bypasses normal business process security.

pay_range_penetration.description: Pay Range Penetration for this Event
